Html:
Hi all,

I am using the FTS to Google conversion project, and would like to know how much time did the parse tree take to be generated - ie from user search string to generation of the tree.

Can anyone please direct me on how best to achieve this?

Thanks!

J.

Just time it in Grammar Explorer for a few complex queries, it shows "run time" in ms.

From my experience (I run similar but more advanced converter on real-life enterprise project) - it is very fast, tiny portion of total time running the query.
